basics.name: Chien Nguyen
basics.label: AI Engineer
basics.summary: I am an AI Engineer at AIMENEXT JSC, Vietnam. I graduated in Applied Mathematics and informatics from Hanoi University of Science and Technology in 2020."

education.institution: Hanoi University of Science and Technology
education.area: Applied Mathematics and Informatics, Talented Program (Highest Honours)

highlights: Research and develop model for OCR problem in the wild (Caution plate recognition, ...).
Research and develop model for OCR problem in document images.
Research and develop model for Object Detection problem such as pupil detection problem, change detection in design images, ...
Optimize and maintain pre-processing system for OCR problem.
Building system to automatically collect bank card data.
Research on sound processing, specifically the problem of speaker diarization, speaker identification.
Building machine learning and deep learning model for meeting note application.
Build financial models and test, simulate and track the effectiveness of models (alpha).
Apply machine learning to some specific problem (Speech processing, image processing).

work.position: Frontend Web Developer & Machine Learning Engineer Intern
highlights: Develop a machine learning model for processing road from satellite images.
